EmailTemplate.name: CA - Partner Creates Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to go solar?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Fresh. Local. Solar.
Hi {!Lead.Name},
Are you interested in joining the energy revolution? Sign up for a BlueWave Community Solar Subscription today and join a community of people who are supporting local solar generation!
Here are a few other reasons to sign up for BlueWave Community Solar Subscription:
Reliable Savings - Save on your monthly utility bill! No Installation Necessary - Receive energy savings without having to invest in a rooftop system. Good Feelings - Contribute to the production of solar energy!
What are you waiting for?
Sign up for Fresh, Local Solar Today.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
